analyzed: 'dzin/_/dur khrod chen po 'jigs pa'i gnas/_/ri gsum rtshe 'am brag gi

analyzed: phyag na rdo rje gtum po chen po khros pa zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs

analyzed: sgrub pa'i mthun rkyen bsags byas nas/_/der ni bkod pa bsham byas nas/_/

analyzed: kun/_/bar snang gang ba'i dkyil lta sgom/_/de nas hum zhes brjod pa yis/_/

analyzed: ma ya ste/_/de skad lan gsum brjod pa yis/_/mthu stobs phyag na rdo rje ni/_/

analyzed: me dpung 'bar ba'i klong dkyil na/_/ye shes sku mchog rngam pa'i tshhul/_/ral

analyzed: gsum phyogs bcur gzigs/_/mche rtshigs sngags kyi 'brug sgra sgrogs/_/khro

analyzed: lus 'dul bar byed/_/thod pa rin chen rgyan gyis brgyan/_/dbu la nor rgyas

analyzed: dung skyong ser/_/snyan la dga' bo nyer dga' dmar/_/dpung pa pad ma chu

analyzed: byin gyis brlab/_/thugs kha'i hum gi 'od zer gyis/_/ye shes sems dpa'

analyzed: spyan drangs te/_/dbang ni bskur la mi bskyod bsam/_/dzahhum bam hogs

analyzed: sngags kyis/_/dgug gzhug dbyer med mnyes par bya/_/thugs kar nyi zla'i

analyzed: dbus su hum/_/hum las 'od 'phros sems can rnams/_/grol bar byas nas

analyzed: nas/_/dgra bgegs nad dang sgrib pa rnams/_/thams cad ma lus bsreg

analyzed: thogs/_/ye shes me dpung phyogs bcur 'phro/_/lha yi sku ni sgom pa yis/_/

analyzed: bsod nams tshhogs ni rdzogs par 'gyur/_/de nyid chu ltar shes pa yis/_/ye

analyzed: shes tshhogs kyang rdzogs par 'gyur/_/de nas lha sku sgyu ma ltar/_/snang la rang

analyzed: yin/_/phyogs skyong bcu la sogs pa yi/_/dpal mgon bdun cu rtsha gnyis

analyzed: thang dang /_/dung chen 'phreng ba rab tu shis/_/u tsha tshar+ya yak+sha se na/_o glu

analyzed: sha dza dza hu~m hu~m phat/_gsang sngags yig 'bru bcu bdun la/_/'bum phrag

analyzed: gsum du snyen pa bya/_/sde brgyad 'dul ba'i drag sngags la/_/'bum phrag

analyzed: gcig gis grangs snyen rdzogs/_/dus snyen rab ni zla ba gsum/_/'bring ni zla

analyzed: yi snyen pa bya/_/thun mtshhams dag tu gtor ma ni/_/thod pa la sogs snod

analyzed: mngar gsum dkar gsum ldan pa bsham/_/de nas byin gyis brlab pa ni/_/

analyzed: yam las rlung ste ram las me/_/kam las mi mgo'i sgyed pu las/_/a las dung chen

analyzed: dang dkar ser dmar ljang dang /_/de las 'od zer 'phros pa yi/_/bar du

analyzed: bcod pa'i gdon bgegs rnams/_/bkug nas ye shes lnga la stim/_/lus

analyzed: zhal du stab/_/gti mug sha yi mchod pa bzhes/_/zhe sdang rus pa'i mchod pa

analyzed: bzhes/_/bdag 'dzin la sogs dgra bgegs rnams/_/bdag med dbyings

analyzed: thums ma ra ya ma ra ya kha kha kha hi kha hi/_lan gsum dag tu bzlas pa yis/_/

analyzed: ma tshhang ba dang ma snyes dang /_/nyes pa'i dri mar gyur pa kun/_/de dag khyed

analyzed: kyis bzod par gsol/_/'dod pa'i don la gsol ba gdab/_/dge ba byang
translated: 5. The mantra of requesting the fulfillment of wishes:🔽 Dedicate the virtue to great enlightenment.🔽In the evening and at bedtime,

original: chub chen por bsngo/_/srod dang nyal bar gyur pa'i tshhe/_/bsrung 'khor gsal
analyzed: chub chen por bsngo/_/srod dang nyal bar gyur pa'i tshhe/_/bsrung 'khor gsal
translated: clearly visualize the protection circle,🔽and go to sleep in the state of luminous dharmakaya.

original: bar bsgoms nas ni/_/'od gsal chos sku'i ngang la nyal/_/rmi lam longs
analyzed: bar bsgoms nas ni/_/'od gsal chos sku'i ngang la nyal/_/rmi lam longs
translated: 6. The mantra of recognizing dreams:🔽Visualize yourself as the Enjoyment Body.🔽When one-eighth of the night remains,

original: skur gsal btab ste/_/nam gyi brgyad cha lus pa na/_/rtsha sngags lan 'bum
analyzed: skur gsal btab ste/_/nam gyi brgyad cha lus pa na/_/rtsha sngags lan 'bum
translated: recite the essence mantra one hundred thousand times.

original: brjod pa yis/_/nang stong zung 'jug lha yi sku/_/snang la rang bzhin med
analyzed: brjod pa yis/_/nang stong zung 'jug lha yi sku/_/snang la rang bzhin med
translated: appearing yet without inherent existence.🔽Then meditate in stages as before.

original: par bsgom/_/de nas rim bzhin sngar ltar bsgoms/_/de ltar rgyun du sgom pa
analyzed: par bsgom/_/de nas rim bzhin sngar ltar bsgoms/_/de ltar rgyun du sgom pa
translated: By continuously meditating in this way,🔽the signs of accomplishment will gradually arise.

original: las/_/grub rtags rnams ni rims bzhin 'byung /_/bar chad thams cad
analyzed: las/_/grub rtags rnams ni rims bzhin 'byung /_/bar chad thams cad
translated: All obstacles will be pacified,

analyzed: zhi ba dang /_/tshhogs gnyis rdzogs nas sgrib gnyis dag_/rdzogs pa'i sangs
translated: the two accumulations will be perfected, the two obscurations will be purified,🔽and the state of perfect buddhahood will be attained.🔽Your body, speech, and mind,

original: rgyas thob pa'i tshhul/_/rang gi lus ngag yid gsum po/_/dag pa gnyis dang ldan pa yis/_/sku gsung thugs su 'char bar 'gyur/_/bcom ldan phyag na rdo
analyzed: rgyas thob pa'i tshhul/_/rang gi lus ngag yid gsum po/_/dag pa gnyis dang ldan pa yis/_/sku gsung thugs su 'char bar 'gyur/_/bcom ldan phyag na rdo
translated: endowed with the two purities, will arise as the enlightened body, speech, and mind.🔽This wish-fulfilling jewel of a sādhana

original: rje'i sku/_/bsgrub thabs yid bzhin nor bu 'di/_/rtsha ba klu sgrub snying po yis/_/
analyzed: rje'i sku/_/bsgrub thabs yid bzhin nor bu 'di/_/rtsha ba klu sgrub snying po yis/_/
translated: of the Bhagavān Vajrapāṇi🔽was clearly written by the unworthy Nāgabodhi.

analyzed: sgro bkur med par gsal bar bris/_/gal te 'khrul pa mchis gyur na/_/bla
translated: If there are any errors,🔽I request the forbearance of the gurus, yidams, ḍākinīs,

original: ma yi dam mkha' 'gro dang /_/chos skyong rnams kyi bzod par gsol/_/dge
analyzed: ma yi dam mkha' 'gro dang /_/chos skyong rnams kyi bzod par gsol/_/dge

translated: May all sentient beings, equal with space,

original: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thob par shog_/dpal phyag na rdo rje'i sgrub thabs yid
analyzed: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thob par shog_/dpal phyag na rdo rje'i sgrub thabs yid
translated: attain perfect buddhahood, having obtained happiness and being free from all suffering.🔽The sādhana of glorious Vajrapāṇi called “The Wish-Fulfilling Gem”
